subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Only John Calipari, a coach trying to march his team toward perfection and a national title, could have found much wrong in the top-seeded Wildcats’ bludgeoning of the Hilltoppers.
snippet: Only John Calipari, a coach trying to march his team toward perfection and a national title, could have found much wrong in the top-seeded Wildcats’ bludgeoning of the Hilltoppers.
